snippet: What the Veterans Administration failed to do for double amputee Michael Sulsona in two years, some New York hardware store workers delivered in an hour: They fixed his broken wheelchair....

headline.print_headline: VA a No Show; Store Workers Fix Vet's Wheelchair
headline.main: VA a No Show; Store Workers Fix Vet's Wheelchair

lead_paragraph: What the Veterans Administration failed to do for double amputee Michael Sulsona in two years, some New York hardware store workers delivered in an hour: They fixed his broken wheelchair.
